nodes.text: Orzmod  was a male Human Jedi living during or after the Cold War.

Justice Orzmod was added to Star Wars: The Old Republic with Knights of the Eternal Throne expansion as a World Boss for Dark vs. Light system. Whenever Light side of the Force reaches victory state on a server, Justice Orzmod has a chance to spawn at one or more of selected locations on Coruscant, Tatooine, Alderaan, Hoth and Dromund Kaas alongside other Light Side World Bosses. Though killing him is required for an in-game achievement, it is impossible the year and the planet where his death took place.
